title: How to know if your fridge needs reassing - Quora

response.answer_text: Could be if the ice in the ice tray is no longer ice but water. If you open the fridge and it is colder in the kitchen than in your fridge. But if the appliance is not keeping food cold then it may be time to get a new one. I keep thermometers in both the regular and freezer section to monitor how each is doing. If you do the same it will tell you how cold it is. Also a lot of compressor noise going on and off and not cooling anything is a sign.

Your fridge will only need regasing if it develops a leak, and you will know that by the fact that it does not switch off and the temperature is not as you have set it.. The modern day frefrigerantzs have no smell.
